--------------------------------------------------------------------------- Upcall socket setup.

Parameters:
[in] max_paksize Maximum packet size bound for "punted" or "ejected" packets received from the dataplane.
[out] vqec_error_t Returns VQEC_OK if the sockets are setup successfully, error code otherwise. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
